amendment.description: Amendment specifies that funds appropriated for the Office of Small and Disadvantaged Business Utilization and the Minority Business Resource Center may not be used for any other purpose.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to strike "not to exceed" for the Office of Small and Disadvantaged Business Utilization.

action.text: Amendment (A001) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee (TX).

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee (TX) amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
